marklogic.body: Forget about what they looked like...this kid was walking back to his dads un armed ..... what authority on earth does george zimmerman have to get out of his car and eapproach him... and then shoot him when he was unarmed.... the police told zimmerman to stay away ...who provocated this? geerge zimmerman did..would this travon martin be alive today if heorge zimmerman would havewaited 5 minutes for the police ? yes... the video of him in the poilice station 34 minutes after he shot martin shows him unhurt WITH HIS SHIRT IN? NO SOIL ON HIS SHIRT NO BLOOD... CONSIDERING transportation time and qestiong in 34 minutes..... how is this possible if zimmerman was in a life and deat struggle...his shirt was in for christs sake.... this case needs to be decided in court ...NOT BY A CORRUPT POLICE DEPT... i dont care if yor republican or dem lib or right....if you cant see killing is wrong then you have big moral problems... this interview shows that his zimmermans publicty defender ..... was not there...HAD NOT..talked to zimmerman until a few days ago.. and has not seen zimmerman before or after the incident...what FACTS DOES HE HAVE...none..... he HAS A GUT FEELING.... well i have a gut feeling about lottery numbers too and I DO NOT WIN... since when is a gut feeling FACT... GET REAL EVERYONE.... listen to the factswhich have not all been established and not what a guy with gut feeling has to say.... we can hear the 911 screams for help..we can see zimmerman ... shirt Tucked in not Bleeding unsoiled 34 minutes after killing martin ... those are facts...and this case is supposed to be CUT and DRY according to Sanford poilice? THATS A PROBLEM
